event.name: Read Stall: Low Priority

event.name: Read Stall: Medium Priority

event.title: CCN-504
event.name: Cache Miss
event.description: Counts the total cache misses. This is the first time lookup result, and is high priority.

event.title: CCN-504
event.name: L3 SF Cache Access
event.description: Counts the number of cache accesses. This is the first time access, and is high priority.

event.title: CCN-504
event.name: Cache Fill
event.description: Counts the total allocations in the HN L3 cache, and all cache line allocations to the L3 cache.

event.title: CCN-504
event.name: POCQ Retry
event.description: Counts the number of requests that have been retried.

event.title: CCN-504
event.name: POCQ Reqs Recvd
event.description: Counts the number of requests received by HN.

event.title: CCN-504
event.name: SF Hit
event.description: Counts the number of snoop filter hits.

event.title: CCN-504
event.name: SF Evictions
event.description: Counts the number of snoop filter evictions. Cache invalidations are initiated.

event.title: CCN-504
event.name: Snoops Sent
event.description: Counts the number of snoops sent. Does not differentiate between broadcast or directed snoops.

event.title: CCN-504
event.name: Snoops Broadcast
event.description: Counts the number of snoop broadcasts sent.

event.title: CCN-504
event.name: L3 Eviction
event.description: Counts the number of L3 evictions.

event.title: CCN-504
event.name: L3 Fill Invalid Way
event.description: Counts the number of L3 fills to an invalid way.

event.title: CCN-504
event.name: MC Retries
event.description: Counts the number of transactions retried by the memory controller.

event.title: CCN-504
event.name: MC Reqs
event.description: Counts the number of requests to the memory controller.

event.title: CCN-504
event.name: QOS HH Retry
event.description: Counts the number of times a highest-priority QoS class was retried at the HN-F.

event.title: Memory
event.name: Snoop
event.description: Data snooped from other processor. This event counts memory-read operations that read data from another processor within the local Cortex-A12 cluster, rather than accessing the L2 cache or issuing an external read. It increments on each transaction, rather than on each beat of data

event.title: Core
event.name: Operations issued
event.description: Number of operations issued, where an operation is either: an instruction or one operation in a sequence of operations that make up a multi-cycle instruction

event.title: Core
event.name: No issue cycles
event.description: Increment for every cycle that no instructions are available for issue

event.title: Core
event.name: Issue cycles
event.description: For every cycle, this event counts the number of instructions issued in that cycle. Multi-cycle instructions are only counted once

event.title: NEON
event.name: MRC data wait
event.description: Number of cycles the processor stalls waiting on MRC data from NEON

event.title: NEON
event.name: Full queue
event.description: Number of cycles that the processor stalls as a result of a full NEON instruction queue or NEON load queue

event.title: NEON
event.name: Idle
event.description: Number of cycles that NEON and integer processors are both not idle

event.name: PMUEXTIN[0,1]

event.title: Java
event.name: Bytecode execute
event.description: Counts the number of Java bytecodes being decoded, including speculative ones

event.title: Java
event.name: SW bytecode execute
event.description: Counts the number of software java bytecodes being decoded, including speculative ones

event.title: Jazelle
event.name: Backward branch execute
event.description: Counts the number of Jazelle taken branches being executed

event.title: Cache
event.name: Coherency miss
event.description: Counts the number of coherent linefill requests performed by the Cortex-A9 processor which also miss in all the other Cortex-A9 processors, meaning that the request is sent to the external memory

event.title: Cache
event.name: Coherency hit
event.description: Counts the number of coherent linefill requests performed by the Cortex-A9 processor which hit in another Cortex-A9 processor, meaning that the linefill data is fetched directly from the relevant Cortex-A9 cache

event.title: Cache
event.name: Inst dependent stall
event.description: Counts the number of cycles where the processor is ready to accept new instructions, but does not receive any because of the instruction side not being able to provide any and the instruction cache is currently performing at least one linefill

event.title: Cache
event.name: Data dependent stall
event.description: Counts the number of cycles where the core has some instructions that it cannot issue to any pipeline, and the Load Store unit has at least one pending linefill request, and no pending TLB requests

event.title: Cache
event.name: TLB stall
event.description: Counts the number of cycles where the processor is stalled waiting for the completion of translation table walks from the main TLB

event.title: Intrinsic
event.name: STREX pass
event.description: Counts the number of STREX instructions architecturally executed and passed

event.title: Intrinsic
event.name: STREX fail
event.description: Counts the number of STREX instructions architecturally executed and failed

event.title: Cache
event.name: Data eviction
event.description: Counts the number of eviction requests because of a linefill in the data cache

event.title: Pipeline
event.name: Issue stage no dispatch
event.description: Counts the number of cycles where the issue stage does not dispatch any instruction because it is empty or cannot dispatch any instructions

event.title: Pipeline
event.name: Issue stage empty
event.description: Counts the number of cycles where the issue stage is empty

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Executed
event.description: Counts the number of instructions going through the Register Renaming stage. This number is an approximate number of the total number of instructions speculatively executed, and even more approximate of the total number of instructions architecturally executed

event.title: Cache
event.name: Data linefills
event.description: Counts the number of linefills performed on the external AXI bus

event.title: Cache
event.name: Prefetch linefills
event.description: Counts the number of data linefills caused by prefetcher requests

event.title: Cache
event.name: Prefetch hits
event.description: Counts the number of cache hits in a line that belongs to a stream followed by the prefetcher

event.title: Core
event.name: Functions
event.description: Counts the number of procedure returns whose condition codes do not fail, excluding all returns from exception

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Main execution unit
event.description: Counts the number of instructions being executed in the main execution pipeline of the processor, the multiply pipeline and arithmetic logic unit pipeline

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Second execution unit
event.description: Counts the number of instructions being executed in the processor second execution pipeline (ALU)

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Load/Store
event.description: Counts the number of instructions being executed in the Load/Store unit

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Floating point
event.description: Counts the number of Floating-point instructions going through the Register Rename stage

event.title: Instruction
event.name: NEON
event.description: Counts the number of NEON instructions going through the Register Rename stage

event.title: Stalls
event.name: PLD
event.description: Counts the number of cycles where the processor is stalled because PLD slots are all full

event.title: Stalls
event.name: Memory write
event.description: Counts the number of cycles when the processor is stalled and the data side is stalled too because it is full and executing writes to the external memory

event.title: Stalls
event.name: Inst main TLB miss
event.description: Counts the number of stall cycles because of main TLB misses on requests issued by the instruction side

event.title: Stalls
event.name: Data main TLB miss
event.description: Counts the number of stall cycles because of main TLB misses on requests issued by the data side

event.title: Stalls
event.name: Inst micro TLB miss
event.description: Counts the number of stall cycles because of micro TLB misses on the instruction side

event.title: Stalls
event.name: Data micro TLB miss
event.description: Counts the number of stall cycles because of micro TLB misses on the data side

event.title: Stalls
event.name: DMB
event.description: Counts the number of stall cycles because of the execution of a DMB memory barrier

event.title: Clock
event.name: Integer core
event.description: Counts the number of cycles during which the integer core clock is enabled

event.title: Clock
event.name: Data engine
event.description: Counts the number of cycles during which the Data Engine clock is enabled

event.title: Clock
event.name: NEON
event.description: Counts the number of cycles when the NEON SIMD clock is enabled

event.title: Memory
event.name: TLB inst allocations
event.description: Counts the number of TLB allocations because of Instruction requests

event.title: Memory
event.name: TLB data allocations
event.description: Counts the number of TLB allocations because of Data requests

event.title: Instruction
event.name: ISB
event.description: Counts the number of ISB instructions architecturally executed

event.title: Instruction
event.name: DSB
event.description: Counts the number of DSB instructions architecturally executed

event.title: Instruction
event.name: DMB
event.description: Counts the number of DMB instructions speculatively executed

event.title: External
event.name: Interrupts
event.description: Counts the number of external interrupts executed by the processor

event.title: PLE
event.name: Cache line rq completed
event.description: Counts the number of PLE cache line requests completed

event.title: PLE
event.name: Cache line rq skipped
event.description: Counts the number of PLE cache line requests skipped

event.title: PLE
event.name: FIFO flush
event.description: Counts the number of PLE FIFO flush requests

event.title: PLE
event.name: Request completed
event.description: Counts the number of PLE FIFO flush completed

event.title: PLE
event.name: FIFO overflow
event.description: Counts the number of PLE FIFO flush overflowed

event.title: PLE
event.name: Request programmed
event.description: Counts the number of PLE FIFO flush program requests

event.title: Clock
event.name: Cycles
event.description: The number of core clock cycles

event.title: Software
event.name: Increment
event.description: Incremented only on writes to the Software Increment Register

event.title: Cache
event.name: Instruction refill
event.description: Instruction fetch that causes a refill of at least the level of instruction or unified cache closest to the processor

event.title: Cache
event.name: Inst TLB refill
event.description: Instruction fetch that causes a TLB refill of at least the level of TLB closest to the processor

event.title: Cache
event.name: Data refill
event.description: Memory Read or Write operation that causes a refill of at least the level of data or unified cache closest to the processor

event.title: Cache
event.name: Data access
event.description: Memory Read or Write operation that causes a cache access to at least the level of data or unified cache closest to the processor

event.title: Cache
event.name: Data TLB refill
event.description: Memory Read or Write operation that causes a TLB refill of at least the level of TLB closest to the processor

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Memory read
event.description: Memory-reading instruction architecturally executed

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Memory write
event.description: Memory-writing instruction architecturally executed

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Executed
event.description: Instruction architecturally executed

event.title: Exception
event.name: Taken
event.description: Exceptions taken

event.title: Exception
event.name: Return
event.description: Exception return architecturally executed

event.title: Instruction
event.name: CONTEXTIDR
event.description: Instruction that writes to the CONTEXTIDR architecturally executed

event.title: Program Counter
event.name: SW change
event.description: Software change of PC, except by an exception, architecturally executed

event.title: Branch
event.name: Immediate
event.description: Immediate branch architecturally executed

event.title: Branch
event.name: Procedure Return
event.description: Procedure return architecturally executed (not by exceptions)

event.title: Memory
event.name: Unaligned access
event.description: Unaligned access architecturally executed

event.title: Branch
event.name: Mispredicted
event.description: Branch mispredicted or not predicted

event.title: Branch
event.name: Potential prediction
event.description: Branch or other change in program flow that could have been predicted by the branch prediction resources of the processor

event.title: L2 Cache
event.name: CO
event.description: Eviction, CastOUT, of a line from the L2 cache

event.title: L2 Cache
event.name: DRH
event.description: Data read hit

event.title: L2 Cache
event.name: DRREQ
event.description: Data read request

event.title: L2 Cache
event.name: DWHIT
event.description: Data write hit

event.title: L2 Cache
event.name: DWREQ
event.description: Data write request

event.title: L2 Cache
event.name: DWTREQ
event.description: Data write request with write-through attribute

event.title: L2 Cache
event.name: IRHIT
event.description: Instruction read hit

event.title: L2 Cache
event.name: IRREQ
event.description: Instruction read request

event.title: L2 Cache
event.name: WA
event.description: Write allocate

event.title: L2 Cache
event.name: IPFALLOC
event.description: Allocation of a prefetch generated by L2C-310 into the L2 cache

event.title: L2 Cache
event.name: EPFHIT
event.description: Prefetch hint hits in the L2 cache

event.title: L2 Cache
event.name: EPFALLOC
event.description: Prefetch hint allocated into the L2 cache

event.title: L2 Cache
event.name: SRRCVD
event.description: Speculative read received

event.title: L2 Cache
event.name: SRCONF
event.description: Speculative read confirmed

event.title: L2 Cache
event.name: EPFRCVD
event.description: Prefetch hint received

event.title: Interrupts
event.name: SoftIRQ
event.description: Linux SoftIRQ taken

event.title: Interrupts
event.name: IRQ
event.description: Linux IRQ taken

event.title: Disk IO
event.name: Write
event.description: Disk IO Bytes Written

event.title: Disk IO
event.name: Read
event.description: Disk IO Bytes Read

event.title: Network
event.name: Receive
event.description: Receive network traffic, including effect from Streamline

event.title: Network
event.name: Transmit
event.description: Transmit network traffic, including effect from Streamline

event.title: Scheduler
event.name: Switch
event.description: Context switch events

event.title: Memory
event.name: Used
event.description: Total used memory size. Note: a process' used memory includes shared memory that may be counted more than once (equivalent to RES from top). Kernel threads are not filterable.

event.title: Memory
event.name: Free
event.description: Available memory size

event.title: Memory
event.name: Buffer
event.description: Memory used by OS disk buffers

event.title: Clock
event.name: Frequency
event.description: Frequency setting of the CPU

event.title: Idle
event.name: State
event.description: CPU Idle State + 1, set the Sample Rate to None to prevent the hrtimer from interrupting the system

event.title: CPU Contention
event.name: Wait
event.description: Thread waiting on contended resource

event.title: CPU I/O
event.name: Wait
event.description: Thread waiting on I/O resource

event.title: Mali GPU Vertex Processor
event.name: Active cycles
event.description: Number of cycles per frame the MaliGP2 was active.

event.title: Mali GPU Vertex Processor
event.name: Active cycles, vertex shader
event.description: Number of cycles per frame the vertex shader unit was active.

event.title: Mali GPU Vertex Processor
event.name: Active cycles, vertex storer
event.description: Number of cycles per frame the vertex storer unit was active.

event.title: Mali GPU Vertex Processor
event.name: Active cycles, vertex loader
event.description: Number of cycles per frame the vertex loader unit was active.

event.title: Mali GPU Vertex Processor
event.name: Cycles vertex loader waiting for vertex shader
event.description: Number of cycles per frame the vertex loader was idle while waiting on the vertex shader.

event.title: Mali GPU Vertex Processor
event.name: Words read, system bus
event.description: Total number of 64 bit words read by the GP2 from the system bus per frame.

event.title: Mali GPU Vertex Processor
event.name: Words written, system bus
event.description: Total number of 64 bit words written by the GP2 to the system bus per frame.

event.title: Mali GPU Vertex Processor
event.name: Read bursts, system bus
event.description: Number of read bursts by the GP2 from the system bus per frame.

event.title: Mali GPU Vertex Processor
event.name: Write bursts, system bus
event.description: Number of write bursts from the MaliGP2 to the system bus per frame.

event.title: Mali GPU Vertex Processor
event.name: Vertices processed
event.description: Number of vertices processed by the MaliGP2 per frame.

event.title: Mali GPU Vertex Processor
event.name: Vertices fetched
event.description: Number of vertices fetched by the MaliGP2 per frame.

event.title: Mali GPU Vertex Processor
event.name: Primitives fetched
event.description: Number of graphics primitives fetched by the MaliGP2 per frame.

event.title: Mali GPU Vertex Processor
event.name: Primitives culled
event.description: Number of graphics primitives discarded per frame, because they were seen from the back or were offscreen.

event.title: Mali GPU Vertex Processor
event.name: Commands written to tiles
event.description: Number of commands (8 Bytes, mainly primitives) written by GP2 to the PP input data structure per frame.

event.title: Mali GPU Vertex Processor
event.name: Memory blocks allocated
event.description: Number of overflow data blocks needed for outputting the PP input data structure per frame .

event.title: Mali GPU Vertex Processor
event.name: Vertex loader cache misses
event.description: Number of cache misses for the vertex shader's vertex input unit per frame.

event.title: Mali GPU Vertex Processor
event.name: Active cycles, vertex shader command processor
event.description: Number of cycles per frame the GP2 vertex shader command processor was active. This includes time waiting for semaphores.

event.title: Mali GPU Vertex Processor
event.name: Active cycles, PLBU command processor
event.description: Number of cycles per frame the MaliGP2 PLBU command processor was active. This includes time waiting for semaphores.

event.title: Mali GPU Vertex Processor
event.name: MaliGP2 PLBU cycles per frame
event.description: Number of cycles per frame the MaliGP2 PLBU output unit was active. This includes time spent waiting on the bus.

event.title: Mali GPU Vertex Processor
event.name: Active cycles, PLBU geometry processing
event.description: Number of cycles per frame the MaliGP2 PLBU was active, excepting final data output. In other words: active cycles through the prepare list commands. This includes time spent waiting on the bus.

event.title: Mali GPU Vertex Processor
event.name: Active cycles, PLBU primitive assembly
event.description: Number of active cycles per frame spent by the MaliGP2 PLBU doing primitive assembly. This does not include scissoring or final output. This includes time spent waiting on the bus.

event.title: Mali GPU Vertex Processor
event.name: Active cycles, PLBU vertex fetcher
event.description: Number of active cycles per frame spent by the MaliGP2 PLBU fetching vertex data. This includes time spent waiting on the bus.

event.title: Mali GPU Vertex Processor
event.name: Active cycles, Bounding-box and command generator
event.description: Number of active cycles per frame spent by the MaliGP2 PLBU setting up bounding boxes and commands (mainly graphics primitives). This includes time spent waiting on the bus.

event.title: Mali GPU Vertex Processor
event.name: Active cycles, Scissor tile iterator
event.description: Number of active cycles per frame spent by the MaliGP2 PLBU iterating over tiles to perform scissoring. This includes time spent waiting on the bus.

event.title: Mali GPU Vertex Processor
event.name: Active cycles, PLBU tile iterator
event.description: Number of active cycles per frame spent by the MaliGP2 PLBU iterating over the tiles in the bounding box generating commands (mainly graphics primitives). This includes time spent waiting on the bus.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Active clock cycles
event.description: Active clock cycles, between polygon start and IRQ.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Total bus reads
event.description: Total number of 64-bit words read from the bus.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Total bus writes
event.description: Total number of 64-bit words written to the bus.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Bus read request cycles
event.description: Number of cycles during which the bus read request signal was HIGH.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Bus write request cycles
event.description: Number of cycles during which the bus write request signal was HIGH.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Bus read transactions count
event.description: Number of read requests accepted by the bus.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Bus write transactions
event.description: Number of write requests accepted by the bus.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Tile writeback writes
event.description: 64-bit words written to the bus by the writeback unit.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Store unit writes
event.description: 64-bit words written to the bus by the store unit.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Texture cache uncompressed reads
event.description: Number of 64-bit words read from the bus into the uncompressed textures cache.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Polygon list reads
event.description: Number of 64-bit words read from the bus by the polygon list reader.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: RSW reads
event.description: Number of 64-bit words read from the bus into the Render State Word register.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Vertex cache reads
event.description: Number of 64-bit words read from the bus into the vertex cache.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Uniform remapping reads
event.description: Number of 64-bit words read from the bus when reading from the uniform remapping table.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Program cache reads
event.description: Number of 64-bit words read from the bus into the fragment shader program cache.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Varying reads
event.description: Number of 64-bit words containing varyings generated by the vertex processing read from the bus.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Texture descriptors reads
event.description: Number of 64-bit words containing texture descriptors read from the bus.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Texture descriptor remapping reads
event.description: Number of 64-bit words read from the bus when reading from the texture descriptor remapping table.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Load unit reads
event.description: Number of 64-bit words read from the bus by the LOAD sub-instruction.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Polygon count
event.description: Number of triangles read from the polygon list.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Pixel rectangle count
event.description: Number of pixel rectangles read from the polygon list.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Lines count
event.description: Number of lines read from the polygon list.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Points count
event.description: Number of points read from the polygon list.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Stall cycles PolygonListReader
event.description: Number of clock cycles the Polygon List Reader waited for output being collected.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Stall cycles triangle setup
event.description: Number of clock cycles the TSC waited for input.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Quad rasterized count
event.description: Number of 2x?2 quads output from rasterizer.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Fragment rasterized count
event.description: Number of fragment rasterized. Fragments/(Quads*4) gives average actual fragments per quad.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Fragment rejected fragment-kill count
event.description: Number of fragments exiting the fragment shader as killed.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Fragment rejected fwd-fragment-kill count
event.description: Number of fragments killed by forward fragment kill.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Fragment passed z/stencil count
event.description: Number of fragments passing Z and stencil test.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Patches rejected early z/stencil count
event.description: Number of patches rejected by EarlyZ. A patch can be 8x8, 4x4 or 2x2 pixels.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Patches evaluated
event.description: Number of patches evaluated for EarlyZ rejection.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Instruction completed count
event.description: Number of fragment shader instruction words completed. It is a function of pixels processed and the length of the shader programs.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Instruction failed rendezvous count
event.description: Number of fragment shader instructions not completed because of failed Rendezvous.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Instruction failed varying-miss count
event.description: Number of fragment shader instructions not completed because of failed varying operation.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Instruction failed texture-miss count
event.description: Number of fragment shader instructions not completed because of failed texture operation.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Instruction failed load-miss count
event.description: Number of fragment shader instructions not completed because of failed load operation.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Instruction failed tile read-miss count
event.description: Number of fragment shader instructions not completed because of failed read from the tilebuffer.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Instruction failed store-miss count
event.description: Number of fragment shader instructions not completed because of failed store operation.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Rendezvous breakage count
event.description: Number of Rendezvous breakages reported.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Pipeline bubbles cycle count
event.description: Number of unused cycles in the fragment shader while rendering is active.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Texture mapper multipass count
event.description: Number of texture operations looped because of more texture passes needed.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Texture mapper cycle count
event.description: Number of texture operation cycles.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Vertex cache hit count
event.description: Number of times a requested vertex was found in the cache (Number of vertex cache hits).

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Vertex cache miss count
event.description: Number of times a requested vertex was not found in the cache (Number of vertex cache misses).

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Varying cache hit count
event.description: Number of times a requested varying was found in the cache (Number of varying cache hits).

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Varying cache miss count
event.description: Number of times a requested varying was not found in the cache (Number of varying cache misses).

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Varying cache conflict miss count
event.description: Number of times a requested varying was not in the cache and its value, retrieved from memory, must overwrite an older cache entry. This happens when an access pattern cannot be serviced by the cache.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Texture cache hit count
event.description: Number of times a requested texel was found in the texture cache (Number of texture cache hits).

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Texture cache miss count
event.description: Number of times a requested texel was not found in the texture cache (Number of texture cache misses).

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Texture cache conflict miss count
event.description: Number of times a requested texel was not in the cache and its value, retrieved from memory, must overwrite an older cache entry. This happens when an access pattern cannot be serviced by the cache.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Compressed texture cache hit count
event.description: Number of times a requested item was found in the cache.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Compressed texture cache miss count
event.description: Number of times a requested item was not found in the cache.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Load/Store cache hit count
event.description: Number of hits in the load/store cache.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Load/Store cache miss count
event.description: Number of misses in the load/store cache.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Program cache hit count
event.description: Number of hits in the program cache.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Program cache miss count
event.description: Number of misses in the program cache.
